name: generator-ng2-alfresco-app
description: Yeoman generator generating angular 2 Alfresco App

scripts.test-generation-app: rimraf temp && gulp generation-app-test && npm run test-install-app-dependencies
scripts.test-install-app-dependencies: cd temp/all-options-test && npm install && cd - && npm run test-copy-node-modules
scripts.test-copy-node-modules: cp -R temp/all-options-test/node_modules temp/app-document-list-test && cp -R temp/all-options-test/node_modules  temp/app-process-service-test && cp  -R temp/all-options-test/node_modules temp/app-search-test
scripts.test-cross-browsers: npm run test-generation-app && npm run test-build-apps && test-browsers-stack-server
scripts.test-browsers-stack-server: cd temp/all-options-test && npm run start:dist & gulp cross-browsers-test
scripts.test-build-apps: cd temp/all-options-test && npm run build && cd - && cd temp/app-document-list-test && npm run build && cd - && cd temp/app-process-service-test && npm run build && cd - && cd temp/app-search-test && npm run build && cd -
